name: Asteroid Voyage
description:
We, FyremanStuidios, are proud to release our first game for PC, Mac, Linux and Andriod. Fly around Asteroids and collect Coins during your Voyage.

Can you get all Achievements?

All Tracks are avalible on Fyremans YouTube Channel and SoundCloud Page:

YT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe0z6JFKOb_ORELRZ...

SC: https://soundcloud.com/fyreman

Please report all Problems or Bugs, so we can fix them.
